name: Leaves BL Visual novel (Demo ver.)
description:
THIS GAME IS  A FANGAME

Leaves is a visual novel with really short stories like Oneshots, where you will find some shipings from GenshinImpact game,  having the opportunity to interact with them on their story.

This a doujin story.

Chapter 1: Cyno x Tighnari story (Demo ver)

Chapter 2: Alhaitham x Kaveh (Exclusive)

What awaits you in this game

  • A little look of a story that is just the beginning.
  • Short stories like Oneshots
  • Funny interactions
  • Language: English and Spanish.

Future

I have on mind to create a many stories, where your favorite characters can be included, so we have a long way to go, this is just the beginning. So if you like the game support us, it will be of great help to us.

For more content and stories.

Support me on patreon
